net.iceyleagons.icicle.ui

Annotation Type GUI


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface GUI
    Annotate any GUI class with this annotation and register it with GUIManager.registerGUI(GUITemplate)
    Since:
    1.2.0-SNAPSHOT

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String title
      MUST BE SET!

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean autoUpdate
      Whether or not to auto update with a scheduler.
      int height
      Only needed if type() is set to CHEST.
      boolean perPlayer
      Deprecated. 
      NOT YET IMPLEMENTED!
      org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryType type
      Default: InventoryType.CHEST
      long updateInterval
      The interval of the updates Default: 1
      java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit updateIntervalUnit
      Pretty self-explanatory, huh?

    • Element Detail

      • title

        public abstract java.lang.String title
        MUST BE SET!
        Returns:
        the title of the inventory

        Default: InventoryType.CHEST
        Returns:
        the type of the gui inventory
        Default:

      • autoUpdate

        public abstract boolean autoUpdate
        Whether or not to auto update with a scheduler.

        Default: true

        Returns:
        whether or not to auto update with a scheduler
        Default:
        true

      • height

        public abstract int height
        Only needed if type() is set to CHEST.

        Otherwise, is the height of the chest inventory. Default: 3

        Returns:
        height of the inventory
        Default:
        3

public abstract boolean perPlayer
        Deprecated. NOT YET IMPLEMENTED!
        Whether the GUI is displayed per player.

        Default: false

        Returns:
        whether or not the GUI is displayed per player
        Default:
        false

        Pretty self-explanatory, huh?

        Default: TimeUnit.SECONDS
